divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a moving sphere in the sky at about 2:30 pm Houston time on september 2, 2005. I was outside in the backyard of my home when I saw a small object in the sky, this object was moving in circles, I decided to go inside my home and grabed my camera. I was able to get a shot of this object moving in the sky and going into the clouds. It was a very distant object white in color and looked like a golf ball. I still have the tape. by the time I went inside my home a very good three minutes elapsed since I have to look for it a see if there any tape available and check the camera if there was enough charge in the battery. When I came out the object was still there. I need someone to come over a take a look at this tape since the object is difficult to trace.
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were no other sightings in Houston on or around September 2nd 2005
